description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In mz-automation libiec61850 v1.4.0, a NULL Pointer Dereference was detected in the mmsServer_handleFileCloseRequest.c function of src/mms/iso_mms/server/mms_file_service.c. The vulnerability manifests as SEGV and causes the application to crash

En mz-automation libiec61850 v1.4.0, se detectó una desreferencia de puntero NULL en la función mmsServer_handleFileCloseRequest.c de src/mms/iso_mms/server/mms_file_service.c. La vulnerabilidad se manifiesta como SEGV y provoca que la aplicación falle.
